Our roads are turning into dirt tracks, bomb zones. Even motorways are full of pot holes now.
Sick of pot holes, sick of getting knocked about in your vehicle, sick of risking your life on your motorbike or cycle ?
Do you want to know why are roads never ever get resurfaced ? Junction markings disappear and never get re-done. No-one knows what lane to use.
Petition the government to spend our tax on repairing our roads or we will all refuse to pay anymore. We pay enough, its time to stop squandering it and give us what we pay for.
